page.title: 04MARSHALL BROTHERS
page.content: {Marshall Brothers }is a big firm in Butterwick based at {Mill Lane, }they use the old windmill as part of the factory.They have 7 articulated lorries,4 Bedfords,9 forklifts.They also do farm work,they have a{prepack} shed,back shed,front shed and a potato shed.{They prepack cauliflower,cabbage {redbeet,carrots,broccoli,onions,swedes {peas,marrows,curly Kale and turnips, } they also grow {mushrooms. }Some people go by cars,vans,trucks and bikes,Marshalls own their own buses to pick some people up.They have 5 cauliflower cutting gangs and they have 6 people in each gang,5 cutting and 1 tractor driver.They employ about {200 people,25 }work in the fields, { {170 }work in the{prepack }and {5 }work on the forklifts.They own fields in Butterwick,Benington,Leverton,Old Leake and Friskney.In Marshalls yard
